WorkItem.Description:
OK, this is a little problem; tiny even.  So I hope you don't hurt yourself falling down laughing when you read it.
 
The rawr page on ej ( http://elitistjerks.com/rawr.php ) as the silverlight object embedded in a table.  Actually it embeds 3 tables deep, but thats another issue.
 
My request is to take the 75% width out of the outermost table, so rawr can be stretched to fill the screen, instead of just 3/4s of the screen.
 
Here's the bit of offending html on the page:
 
<table id="mainWrapper" width="75%" align="center" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
 
Thanks.
WorkItem.Summary: adjust table size on ej rawr page

Comments.Message: Scroll all the way down, at the bottom there's a link to make rawr take full width.
